titleStmt.title: A book of cookrye Very necessary for all such as delight therin. Gathered by A.W.
titleStmt.author: A. W.

editionStmt.edition: And now newlye enlarged with the seruing in of the table. With the proper sauces to each of them conuenient.

notesStmt.note: Another edition of STC 24895, published in 1584 with title: A booke of cookry.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
